title: Anti-Vaxx Sperm = Bitcoin? Jeopardy Gerrymandering 8.20.21
itunes:title: Anti-Vaxx Sperm = Bitcoin? Jeopardy Gerrymandering 8.20.21
description:
In episode 973 Jack and Miles are joined by host of the Pod Yourself A Gun podcast Vince Mancini to discuss a terrorist trying to blow up the library of congress, Anti-vaxx sperm being as good as gold, people losing their shit on planes, Fox News to have employees reveal vaxx status, the Canadian election shit show, the new Jeopardy host and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS!
  2. Terrorist Threatened to Blow Up Library of Congress, Stands Down
  3. Anti-Vaxx Sperm is the new gold
  4. People still acting like feral cocaine hogs on airplanes
  5. Fox News to employees: REVEAL YOUR VAXX STATUS ASAP
  6. The Canadian Election is Already a Shitshow
  7. The New Jeopardy Host Suuuuuucks
  8. LISTEN: Masayoshi Takanaka - "BREEZIN"


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
